doc:
Jimmy Hunt https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jimmy_Hunt 0 Jimmy Hunt (December 4, 1939) is an American actor. He is perhaps best known for his role as David in Invaders from Mars (1953). In the 1986 remake of the same film he plays the police chief. Hunt has also appeared in films like Song of Love, Sorry, Wrong Number, Week-End with Father and many more. He often appeared opposite Gigi Perreau. Jimmy_Hunt ( December_4_,_1939 ) is an_American_actor . He is_perhaps_best_known for his_role as David in Invaders from Mars_(_1953_) . In the_1986_remake of the_same_film he plays the_police_chief . Hunt has_also_appeared in films like Song of Love , Sorry , Wrong_Number , Week-End with Father and many_more . He often appeared opposite_Gigi_Perreau .
